lines.text: I shoulda robbed people with my brain instead of a gun.
Miss Keechie, do you know what the Mississippi state animal is?
I don't know. A deer, maybe?
No, sir! It's a squashed dog in the road!
You think life's free, don't you, Elmo? I ain't never had my name in the papers like you fellas.
I can tell he sells marijuana just by how he drives.
I come from the Ozarks. All we grow there is rocks and tomatoes.
I think it'll be a boy.
Well I hope it is. But if it is, he sure will not be named after his dad, God rest his soul. He crossed me up once too often, lying. He didn't deserve to have no baby named after him.
